    • Constructor Detail

      • StreamResource

        public StreamResource(MediaType mediaType,
                      Map<String,Object> headers,
                      Object... contents)
               throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        mediaType - The resource media type.
        headers - The HTTP response headers for this streamed resource.
        contents - The resource contents.
        If multiple contents are specified, the results will be concatenated.
        Contents can be any of the following:
        • byte[]
        • InputStream
        • Reader - Converted to UTF-8 bytes.
        • File
        • CharSequence - Converted to UTF-8 bytes.
        Throws:
        IOException
